item.title: Having fun and really no profit with $ORIGIN expansion variable in Java
item.description: Having fun and really no profit with $ORIGIN expansion variable in Java gennaio 30th, 2017 Days ago I was reading this [0] interesting article about the dynamic linker expansion variables, and so I tought it would be fun to search for binaries with the RPATH dynamic tag containing the $ORIGIN variable. So digging through dynamic tags using eu-readelf -d I found that the java ELF binary has the following RPATH:
